text: Great food and service. Just wish they could get their times correct. They tell you 20 minutes, then when you get there on time, you have to wait another 20-30 minutes foe your food.

text: Last time I ordered, they forgot my boneless wings and all the dip cups I ordered. The guy in the store acted like he didn't believe me when I called and asked for the rest of the items I had PAID FOR! They sent out the boneless but I â€¦More

text: Every single time i order from here i get a call 5 to 10 minutes later saying they are out of something... 4 out of 4 times. I can never get what i want. Dont waste your time.

text: Staff is very polite and great to work with. Customers however are very rude. Not impressed with how rude some people can be in a place of service.

text: I ordered a pizza and waited 1-1/2-hrs when they said it would be 45-minutes. When I called them they didnâ€™t even show that I put an order in.  This is absolutely unacceptable. I can see now why people have rated you terrible. I will be â€¦More

name: Andrew Luckman
text: Terrible terrible service I did an online order waited an hour called and they couldnâ€™t tell me why it was taking so long so I waited another hour and call again and said it would be deliver in 17 minutes. Well then they call me back to â€¦More

text: Our pizza delivery was 30 minutes late.  When you pay $50 bucks for pizza, you expect better.   The pizza tasted like mostly bread, not much cheese and just not worth the money.   Not ordering from them again.

name: Joslin Hawk
text: It was good  not the best I have had at Pizza hut but it was clean and I like there designed chooses and there needs to be more ppl working there because the service is slow because there was only two ppl there over all it was ok

text: A little to greasy

name: Wayne Thai
text: So there was a sad state of affairs which led to my order needing to be voided and Connor really helped me with figuring out the problem. You don't get customer service like that often enough. Very impressed. ðŸ¤™

text: Rather disappointing. I got both pizzas, but one looked like the crust had been torn off and only part of the pizza was cut. When I called, they offered a new pizza for free, to which I agreed, but that one was all wrong. The sauce was â€¦More

name: Zach Martin
text: The tables and utensils are sticky, along with items on the table such as flip books showing specials. Waitresses are rude to customers, refusing to show kindness to new customers or even so much as greet them. There is a waitress named â€¦More

name: Rebecca Silva
text: Ordered 20 piece bbq boneless wings. When got home they were buffalo wings.  When I got home and saw, i called and they told me they were out of bbq. They never told me they were out of bbq sauce. And manager never offered to fix the problem offer me my money back. Never going back.

name: Kari Adams
text: Food was good service was great. But the dining area was not clean

name: Ruth King
text: Salad bar was awful! Very few choices and most of those were empty. Pizza was great as usual!

name: Mackenzie Jesser
text: The last manager, Oscar Sedano, was a more efficient manager and the new manager is not very personable at all and is over demanding to the employees. My family will not be visiting Jerome Pizza Hut anymore, itâ€™s very upsetting and ridiculous.

name: steve strickland
text: Very stingy with there toppings here. Ordered half cheese  and half  beef and ham. Meat was only on 1/4 of pizza not half and 2 inches from crust. There was exactly 10 peices of beef and not much ham either.  Ordered online and it was â€¦More

name: Steven Dallas
text: First let me say that this rating is NOT for the restaurant itself. The waitress was great, the restaurant was clean enough and food came out in a timely manner. This rating is ONLY for the pizza itself. It was prepped and cooked just fine â€¦More

name: John Olson
text: Although the review isn't good (for reasons to be discussed in a moment) I enjoy having a GOOD pizza from da Hut. Over the past three months and nine pizzas here is your average tasty score... Not! â€¦More

name: J S
text: I never like to leave a bad review with a business, but I made an order for delivery online. I receive a call 2 minutes before the estimated delivery time to be told that my location was two miles outside of their 5 mile delivery radius. I â€¦More

text: Tried calling Jerome Pizza Hut multiple times in the past 6 months and no one has ever answered the phone.  Did a dine in one evening and the phone rang of the hook while the employees joked in the kitchen area.  Tried calling again this â€¦More

text: Very slow service.  Only 2 people working.  Both are very loud & the whole restaurant heard that one customer's credit card had been declined.  Very un-professional!  Will not stop here again!

text: I got there to pick up my pizza tonight and they told me it got cancelled because they were out of pineapple. To top it off they were rude about it. I then get a call from their call center saying their printers were down. Nobody took responsibility and I call bs. Won't return!

name: Miguel Ferreira
text: Absolutely ridiculous.  Last 3 orders have been disappointing. Cold, stale, and missing ordered sauces. Called manager and said she gave us credit but when we tried to order the following week said thag we only had $4 credit. Order at your own risk.
